name: Stalk
description: A platinum lance with a slight lilt and soft green sheen. This beautiful weapon has wielded long ago by the dragon rider Hyacinth of the Infinite Sky, a central figure in the Lunar war that temporarily united humans and drapons against an Illithid threat.

special_ability.name: Feather Fall
special_ability.description: Cast feather fall once perday on the bearer, crit on 18-20 while feather fall is active.

name: Frost Bite
description: Arcane dagger with a blade made of magical ice which once belonged to the wizard Logan Swale, who helped build the palace of Qurnat as Swada. A vicious cut throat in his yourh he went to great lenghts in his twilight years to 'Build life up instead of cut it down.'

special_ability.name: Shape Water
special_ability.description: Can be thrown at water to emulate cantrip Shape Water.

special_ability.name: Return
special_ability.description: Can be thrown and will return to the wielder, cannot be lost or stolen.
